NOTES:

IMAGiNE bringing you another release..........The Roommate

Right before i even start i must warn you the copy is pretty shite and was total shite before the clean up.
Video before had aloads of camera movement ( must have had an itchy ass ) , as a flicker through,had lots of glares,also
looked like the picture was breaking up through with all the pixels everywhere 
Audio was is typical cam audio and was way way too loud.
Work done ....firstly decided not to cut th efile up to a million pieces to hide the camera movement....Q isn't good enough that amount
of hrs on it,however we did do a auto crop so it removed all black borders it could with losing any video.
Then we fixed the pixel issue the best we could but by doing so it lost some sharpness,which we added back at the end of the encode.
Also changed the brightness and contrast and colours......nothing we can really do about the flicker,but it does look worse on a pc than
a normal tv.
Audio we just lowered the volume by 70% and converted to mp3.

Enjoy folks
